nodes.text: The Imperial Outpost on Lok was a massive stronghold established by the Galactic Empire as part of their plan to extend their control over less developed worlds.
After the Battle of Yavin, this outpost was commanded by General Otto.

Around 1 ABY, the Empire managed to capture a Rebel Corellian corvette and planed to use fill it with explosives and  send it hurtling into Centerpoint Station in the Corellian system. The objective was to have the Rebel Alliance blamed for the attack. As the Rebels suspected General Otto might be supplying the explosives being used on the corvette, Master Sergeant Crowley therefore sent an agent to the Imperial outpost on Lok. The Rebel operative successfully retrieved data including the location of the stolen corvette.
Around the same time, the retired Imperial Naval Captain Boyrake was present in the outpost. Meanwhile, a spacer managed to infiltrate the base and stole a piece of shock trooper armor.

The same year, Han Solo tasked Rebel operatives to disrupt the Imperial outpost to show to the Empire that being on Lok is not an easy assignment. The Rebels infiltrated the base where they shut down the power generators and switched some Imperial banners for Rebel banners. They also attacked General Otto who barely survived the raid.
